abstract: CBS delivered more viewers on Thursday, but ABC fared better among adults 18 to 49, with “Grey’s Anatomy,” with Ellen Pompeo and Patrick Dempsey, and “Lost” putting it on top in that demographic in the 9 and 10 p.m. hours, Nielsen estimated.
lead_paragraph: CBS delivered more viewers on Thursday, but ABC fared better among adults 18 to 49, with “Grey’s Anatomy,” with Ellen Pompeo and Patrick Dempsey, and “Lost” putting it on top in that demographic in the 9 and 10 p.m. hours, Nielsen estimated.

headline.main: Thursday Ratings: ABC On Top Among Young Viewers
